rules.description: For Xcode: option + escape to alt-shift-tab
Left and Right Command together -> F19
Right and Left Command together -> F19
left command to left command + f16
left right option diamond up -> hyper up
left right option diamond left -> hyper left
left right option diamond right -> hyper right
left right option diamond down -> hyper down
right option diamond left with selection
right option diamond up with selection
right option diamond right with selection
right option diamond down with selection
right option next word with selection
right option prev word with selection
right option line start with selection
right option line end with selection
right command to right command + f13(After num pad 0)
